name: V-Tech Solutions
overview:
V-Tech provides IT Security, Data Center Services, and Service Desk Management to our clients and business partners. Headquartered in Silver Spring, Maryland, V-Tech enjoys a nationwide service area and has achieved key certifications from the Small Business Administration (SBA) and Veterans Administration that includes VA certified Veteran Owned Small Business, SBA Small Disadvantaged Business (SDB), as well as SBA 8(a). Additionally, V-Tech is an ISO/IEC 20000-1:2005 certified firm with a proven IT Service Management processes and Quality Management System.

V-Tech has always provided experienced, customer-focused professionals to meet the outsourcing, consulting, and business needs of our clients. We bring proven technical and management expertise, industry certifications, financial strength, and a unique ability to collaborate with our clients. Our company slogan, “Excellence at Work,” exemplifies V-Tech’s commitment to ensuring that our clients meet their program objectives as we improve their agility, cut costs, and reduce risks.

milestones.description: V-Tech Solutions, Inc. Wins $4.1 Million Forensic Accounting Contract Supporting U.S. Forces in Afghanistan
milestones.source_description: V-Tech Solutions, Inc. Wins $4.1 Million Forensic Accounting Contract Supporting U.S. Forces in Afghanistan
